name: Flying Whale (Surveillance)
description:
Simple rules of the game! Make sure you read it first

WASD Move

Space/Alt dive up and down

Q/E change perspective

P Spray Water

Use the water column to push the box to the switch in order to enter the next level!

Hope you enjoy it!

It is inspired by one accidental drawing from Draw&Guess.

The prototype of the whale
